forumNotes.author: ronbeck
forumNotes.content:
Hi all,  

I'm new here and was wondering if anyone has much experience with Boot Scriptor? I am trying to get a boot CD that was created using it ported to a USB stick.  

I can't even get boot scriptor scripts to run properly in the debugger.... possible Vista issue maybe?  

I have been successful creating a Vista install stick, XP install stick, UBCD stick and a few of my own... but this Techie'z Toolkit (with boot scriptor) has me stumped.   

Any help would be greatly appreciated.  

Thanks in advance.  

ronbeck

forumNotes.content:
Hmmm, ![:good:](http://reboot.pro/public/style_emoticons/default/good.gif) ...why do I have the feeling that "Techie'z" rhymes with WAREZ? ![^_^](http://reboot.pro/public/style_emoticons/default/happy.png) The general idea about a section called "tutorials" is that people posts Tutorials in it, not asks help in it. Thread moved.
jaclaz
